txt.en: Seek out Glynn Harper and tell him of your accomplishments.

'Greetings [placeholder], still alive are you? Well done, though doubtless some cunning Orc will remedy that oversight sooner or later. In the meantime, why don't you tell me about your valorous adventures here in the Lone-lands? It'd be a shame if you were to die before I had a chance to write them down and compose something fitting for posterity - assuming of course some enterprising gang of goblins doesn't burn this tavern down around my ears before then...'
Continue to assist the inhabitants of the Lone-lands.
As barren as the Lone-lands are, there are still inhabitants who could use your aid, such as the Eglain of Ost Guruth.
